title: Ticket #156: Detect recursion in nested DAGs
description:
When using nested DAGs with DAGMan, having a DAG nested inside of itself can quickly bring down a machine. DAGMan should detect this case and exit with an appropriate error message.

This is a feature request from NMI.
remarks:
2009-Feb-10 21:36:36 by matt:
Should DAGMan detect this upfront or during execution?

+1 for during execution: avoids upfront materialization of full dag, and handles the case of an edited dag during execution
